column4: If I right click on an icon on my desktop and go to properties, how do I find out the location of the icon so I can use it in alacarte?
If I right click on an icon on my desktop and go to properties, how do I find out the location of the icon so I can use it in alacarte?
I'm trying to get the ies4linux icon and its not in /usr/share/pixmaps/
